channel.title: Floating bubbles Help

item.title: Floating bubbles Help
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Hi, iâ€™ve added the floating bubbles snippet released quite a while ago and i cant seem to figure out why the bubbles arnt actually appearing on my screen.

in my startup method ive got a for loop which adds 25 bubbles.
To check if the code is working i added an output which outputs 25 times.

for (int index = 0; index < 25; index++) { bubbles.add(new Bubble()); System.out.println("Bubble Added"); }

in my drawloginscreen method ive got this

for (Bubble bubble : bubbles) { bubble.draw(Bubble.BOUNCING_BALLS); System.out.println("Bouncing Balls Started!"); }
essentially an infinite loop of bouncing balls. Although the balls dont appear. Again it is outputting but not actually drawing the bubbles them selves
Any Help?

Read full topic
